Package seng202.team4.controller

Class ContributionsGraphController

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng202.team4.controller.ContributionsGraphController
  • public class ContributionsGraphController
extends java.lang.Object
    Performs the logic for generating a visualization for the contribution of each selected route to the users overall carbon footprint. This is a JavaFX BarChart this is displayed in a new window when the 'Contribution Graph' is clicked on the Emissions tab

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private javafx.scene.chart.BarChart<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double> contributionChart
      the JavaFX BarChart being displayed
      private javafx.scene.chart.CategoryAxis x
      The x axis for the bar chart, will have the details of each route
      private javafx.scene.chart.NumberAxis y
      The y axis for the barchart for the carbon emissions in C02 kg per passenger

      ContributionsGraphController()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void setUp​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Route> selectedRoutes)
      Sets up the BarChart by creating an XYChart data object for each route selected by the user and adding them to the contributionChart

      • setUp

        public void setUp​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Route> selectedRoutes)
        Sets up the BarChart by creating an XYChart data object for each route selected by the user and adding them to the contributionChart
        Parameters:
        selectedRoutes - ObservableList the routes the user has currently selected via the routes tab
